answers.answer: I had to do one because they were worried about protein in my urine. turned out fine, but you don't want to mess around with preeclampsia
Oh I c what do they make u do if ur urine doesn't have enough protein?

My doc does them standard on everyone at the beginning of the pregnancy. You dont want protein in your urine or sugar in yoir urine as it could be a sign of diabetes and preeclampsia.  Its not a big deal, just pee into the toilet thing and put it in the container..keep the container chilled.
Okay thanks guys I was worried. This is my first pregnancy..

Mine too. Just be sure that if you ever have any questions, dont be afraid to ask the doctor. I would alsway forget when I got into the room so now I write them all on the little paper bed covers when I get in the room and just go down the list. Dont be afraid to ask why something needs to be done, what they are checking for, what any lab results mean, what you should ecpect at thr next appointment,  etc etc :-)

question: Has anybody had to do a 24he urine count. My doc didn't really explain why. Should I freak out? What is it for? Has anybody else had to do one if so what is it for?
title: have to do a 24 hr urine count.
